channel.title: PAC-Bayes on Mahrokh Ghoddousi Boroujeni
channel.description: Recent content in PAC-Bayes on Mahrokh Ghoddousi Boroujeni

item.title: A PAC-Bayesian Framework for Optimal Control with Stability Guarantees
item.description: This paper presents a novel approach using PAC-Bayes theory to provide generalization bounds for Stochastic Nonlinear Optimal Control (SNOC), enhancing control policy reliability and mitigating overfitting, demonstrated through neural network controllers in cooperative robotics. To appear in the IEEE Conference on Decision and Control, 2024.

item.title: Personalized Federated Learning of Probabilistic Models: A PAC-Bayesian Approach
item.description: This paper introduces PAC-PFL, a personalized federated learning algorithm that leverages PAC-Bayesian theory and differential privacy to enhance model accuracy and calibration for heterogeneous clients, validated through experiments on various datasets. Under review.
